subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after being cleared of doping accusations, Ivan Basso, the Giro d’Italia champion, signed a two-year contract to ride for Lance Armstrong’s former Discovery Channel team.
snippet: Two weeks after being cleared of doping accusations, Ivan Basso, the Giro d’Italia champion, signed a two-year contract to ride for Lance Armstrong’s former Discovery Channel team.
